    Software Architect

    Maintenance and support of software.
    Thanks to my passing through Fintonic I have acquired the following attitudes in the following technologies:

    • Development in Java J2EE and Scala.
    • Frameworks: Spring Cloud, Spring Boot, Spring Core, Spring Security, Spring MVC, Spring AMQP, Spring Data, Spring Aspect, Apache Thrift, Hibernate, MyBatis, AngularJS, Bootstrap and Jquery.

    • Testing: JUnit, Mockito and JMeter.
    • Application servers: Tomcat and Jetty.
    • RDBMS: Mysql.
    • Messaging system: RabbitMQ.
    • Cloud Services: Amazon EC2 and Amazon CloudWatch.
    • NoSQL: MongoDB.
    • Big Data Tools: Apache Spark, Logstash, Elasticsearch and Kibana.
    • Continuous integration and software quality: Jenkins and Sonar.
    • Repositories: Apache Maven, Artifactory, SVN and Git.
    • Other tools: Web Services (SOA and REST), Drools, Solr, JSP, JSTL, Javascript, JAX-WS, JAXB, Javascript and Agile Methodologies.
